statistics.js


Elementary statistic functions.

Functions

OAT.Statistics.sum(array)


Sums all values from array .

OAT.Statistics.product(array)


Gives product of all values from array .

OAT.Statistics.amean(array)


Gives arithmetic mean of all values from array .

OAT.Statistics.max(array)


Returns highest value from array .

OAT.Statistics.min(array)


Returns lowest value from array .

OAT.Statistics.distinct(array)


Counts distinct values in array .

OAT.Statistics.variance(array)


Returns variance of array .

OAT.Statistics.deviation(array)


Returns standard deviation of array .

OAT.Statistics.median(array)


Returns standard median of array .

OAT.Statistics.mode(array)


Returns standard mode of array .
